replies.body: He buterfly clicks.. I assure you he is legit.
replies.body_tagged: He buterfly clicks.. I assure you he is legit.

replies.body: Please do not make spam topics. Nor publicly "shame" someone.
replies.body_tagged: Please do not make spam topics. Nor publicly "shame" someone.

replies.body:
I know the thread is locked and all, but just for future reference, don't freaking trust that CPS plugin. Even myself with my turtle paced click got presumably 21 CPS in a sudamerican server which god only knows where it was hosted but I had ultra high ping and latency and as you can see it was only yet so off.

Plus, it's absolutely broken for some 1.8 subversions where the click events are a bit  broken. If that isn't enough, 19 CPS is easily pursuable with butterfly or drag clickstyles.

If I were you I would uninstall the CPS plugin and go in the never ending search for a decent anticheat. It just isn't reliable at all.
